reasoning:

augmented_query: "U.S. agricultural productivity growth trends 1948-2013, including the role of technology, labor markets, and government policy."
query: “In 2013 the level of U.S. farm output was about 2.7 times its 1948 level, and productivity was growing at an average annual rate of 1.52%.
